# ARMatteGenerator.Resolution

**Enumeration**

A resolution for a matte texture.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Resolution
```

## Overview

You generate a matte texture every frame, specifying whether its resolution is the full size or half of the camera image.

## Choosing a Resolution Option

- **ARMatteGenerator.Resolution.full**: An option that specifies the full camera image resolution.
- **ARMatteGenerator.Resolution.half**: An option that specifies half of the camera image resolution.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
